DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the research study is to investigate the effect of a brain stimulation technique called Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation (TDCS) in improving swallowing functions in subjects who develop dysphagia after a unilateral hemispheric infarction.
DOC.brief_title: Transcranial Direct Current Stimulation (TDCS) for Facilitating Swallowing Improvement After an Acute Unilateral Hemispheric Stroke
DOC.criteria: Acute ischemic stroke Between 24168 hours after onset Moderate to severe dysphagia based on swallowing assessment Preexisting swallowing impairment Intracerebral hemorrhage Pacemaker of other electrically sensitive device
